thread.title: Great location, modern rooms and a friendly staff at a price that s right!
thread.title_full: Great location, modern rooms and a friendly staff at a price that s right! - Review of Sanctuary Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Deanna M
title: Great location, modern rooms and a friendly staff at a price that s right!
text:
Our room was "just right" for two. We asked for a room with a view and recieved what we asked for. The modern design was delightful. I was a bit concerned when i read some of the reviews about the dim lights but alas, there IS light for the mirror in the bathroom for makeup and my claustrophobic man was perfectly fine with the room - a true test! We loved the location - walking distance to the MOMA and 5th avenue. The subway is literally at the end of the block.
Room Tip: request a room with a view if you want one. They are very accomodating at the desk and will do what... See more room tips
